content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_stone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 22, "index": 18}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 5, "index": 20}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_slab", "quantity": 56, "index": 21}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 24, "index": 22}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "pumpkin_pie", "quantity": 26, "index": 28}, {"type": "purple_dye", "quantity": 36, "index": 31}, {"type": "detector_rail", "quantity": 19, "index": 33}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 7, "index": 34}, {"type": "music_disc_strad", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 3, "index": 37}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 15, "index": 38}, {"type": "sandstone_wall", "quantity": 18, "index": 42}, {"type": "daylight_detector", "quantity": 55, "index": 43}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}, {"type": "skull_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a smooth_stone_slab, I need to place three smooth_stones in a row on the crafting table. Therefore, I will move one of the smooth_stones from slot 37 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 37 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_stone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 22, "index": 18}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 5, "index": 20}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_slab", "quantity": 56, "index": 21}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 24, "index": 22}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "pumpkin_pie", "quantity": 26, "index": 28}, {"type": "purple_dye", "quantity": 36, "index": 31}, {"type": "detector_rail", "quantity": 19, "index": 33}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 7, "index": 34}, {"type": "music_disc_strad", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 2, "index": 37}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 15, "index": 38}, {"type": "sandstone_wall", "quantity": 18, "index": 42}, {"type": "daylight_detector", "quantity": 55, "index": 43}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}, {"type": "skull_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that there is one smooth_stone in slot 1, I need to add another one to slot 2.
act: move from slot 37 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: smooth_stone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 22, "index": 18}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 5, "index": 20}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_slab", "quantity": 56, "index": 21}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 24, "index": 22}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "pumpkin_pie", "quantity": 26, "index": 28}, {"type": "purple_dye", "quantity": 36, "index": 31}, {"type": "detector_rail", "quantity": 19, "index": 33}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 7, "index": 34}, {"type": "music_disc_strad", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 15, "index": 38}, {"type": "sandstone_wall", "quantity": 18, "index": 42}, {"type": "daylight_detector", "quantity": 55, "index": 43}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}, {"type": "skull_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Finally, I need to add the last smooth_stone to slot 3 so that they are all in a row.
act: move from slot 37 to slot 3 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "smooth_stone_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 22, "index": 18}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 5, "index": 20}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_slab", "quantity": 56, "index": 21}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 24, "index": 22}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "pumpkin_pie", "quantity": 26, "index": 28}, {"type": "purple_dye", "quantity": 36, "index": 31}, {"type": "detector_rail", "quantity": 19, "index": 33}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 7, "index": 34}, {"type": "music_disc_strad", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 15, "index": 38}, {"type": "sandstone_wall", "quantity": 18, "index": 42}, {"type": "daylight_detector", "quantity": 55, "index": 43}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}, {"type": "skull_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
